Used this for a holiday party and got complimented on the look of this jacket all night. My brother paid triple the price for a very similar jacket at a department store. The fit was exactly what I was expecting, I didn’t have to downsize or upsize to account for it coming from overseas. The quality of the material feels great, and the look is top shelf. If I had to find something to complain about it would be the buttons on the cuff, they’re a little loose and jingly for my taste, but it worked out perfectly for the holiday party I used this at.  10/10 would recommend.
Ordered purple, got blue. Ordered small (which is the size that fits me for shirts on Amazon) and it's big on me.

This velour blazer is 1000x better in person. All photos don't do its justice. With that said. From the fabric, to comfort and size. It's perfect. Sure, you can go to a higher brand label. But not everyone wants to spend over $500 to $5000 just for a blazer.  Coofandy does an excellent velour/velvet blazer for men. I'm 6ft tall, 20inch biceps, between athletic/sticky broad shoulder build. Got this in a XXL. It fits just right. Not much room in the bicep/lat area. So even a XXXL will fit me. Don't get me wrong, I still have some room in this and it does have some stretch. Pretty forgiving fabric. I like that the shoulders have some padding as well. This will keep you blazer in much better shape when hanging it with a proper blazer/coat hanger. All in all, absolutely love it. Can't beat the price and shipped fast. Don't listen to the negative reviews. The blazer is legit and as good as it gets at the price. If you want a Gucci, Armani and so forth. Then seek out those companies. And good luck paying under $100.00 for a velour Gucci blazer. It also came with couple extra buttons and all pockets are functional. Thanks! 😎

This jacket was amazing! It looks so good in person, however, the sizing is so weird. My husband is 6'1" and usually a large, however, based on the other reviews I ordered a size up and got him an XL. It buttoned and fit in the waist but was too short on his arms and torso. I know he really wanted to keep it because the fabric looked so good but it was just too short. If you are a short king, this may work for you if you just make sure to size up one from your normal size! I think his overall height made it ill fitting, so I didn't know how to rate it. It does look and feel very nice!
I got this for prom and I loved it. It feels very good and was shockingly good quality for the relatively low price point. I would highly recommend it.
